statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_time FROM user_behavior;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT action_type, post_id FROM user_behavior WHERE action_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_time FROM user_behavior ORDER BY action_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_time FROM user_behavior WHERE action_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE action_type = 'comment' ORDER BY action_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_actions FROM user_behavior GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type, post_id FROM user_behavior WHERE action_time BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_behavior WHERE post_id IN (SELECT post_id FROM user_behavior WHERE action_type = 'share');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM news_articles;
SELECT * FROM news_articles WHERE publish_date >= NOW();
SELECT article_id, title, author FROM news_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM news_articles WHERE publish_date > '2022-05-01' AND author = 'John Doe';
SELECT article_id, title, content FROM news_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users JOIN news_articles ON users.user_id = news_articles.article_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT title, content, published_date FROM articles ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.title, ua.action_type FROM users u JOIN articles a ON u.user_id = a.author_id JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id ORDER BY ua.action_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(article_id) AS total_articles FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_articles > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activity FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT a.title, a.content, u.username FROM articles a JOIN users u ON a.author_id = u.user_id;
SELECT u.username AS author, COUNT(*) AS total_articles, MAX(a.published_date) AS latest_publish_date FROM users u JOIN articles a ON u.user_id = a.author_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM articles ORDER BY published_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.title, t.total_views FROM users u INNER JOIN articles a ON u.id = a.author_id INNER JOIN traffic_data t ON a.id = t.article_id WHERE u.id = 2;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, published_at FROM articles ORDER BY published_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, a.title, t.total_views FROM users u JOIN articles a ON u.id = a.author_id JOIN traffic_data t ON t.article_id = a.id WHERE t.total_views > 1000;
SELECT ui.interaction_type, ui.timestamp, u.username, a.title FROM user_interactions ui JOIN users u ON ui.user_id = u.id JOIN articles a ON ui.article_id = a.id WHERE ui.interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE role IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT article_id, title, content FROM articles WHERE author_id = 3 ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, article_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, category FROM user_preferences WHERE category IN ('Tech', 'Science') AND user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY user_id;
